meanings.definition: Imperfectives: Expressing an ongoing or incomplete action.
meanings.sent1: She dances imperfectives every Saturday morning.
meanings.sent2: They walk imperfectives along the beach every evening.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel was imperfectives gathering nuts for the winter.
meanings.sent4: The river flows imperfectives, never stopping its journey.
meanings.sent5: The children play imperfectives in the park, their laughter echoing.
